It's designed to feel relaxed through the shoulders, chest and body for an athletic fit you can layer. Our premium, smooth-on-both-sides fleece feels warmer and softer than ever, while keeping the same lightweight build you love. Benefits:Subtle Windrunner lines nod to the classic running jacket from the late '70s. Dropped shoulders and paneled sleeve design helps you move with less restriction. Partial elastic hem helps seal in your warmth and hold the hoodie in place when you move. Zippered hand pockets feature the signature Tech Fleece taped pocket surround. Full-zip design with a scuba hood lets you adjust your style and coverage. Product Details:Nike Futura logo at left chest. Body/Hood Lining: 53% cotton/47% polyester. Pocket Bag Knuckle Side: 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported. products.name: Wool 2pc Suit
products.description: Introducing the Canali Wool 2pc Suit, a classic and sophisticated addition to any man's wardrobe. This elegant suit is crafted from 100% wool and features a timeless black color with a notch lapel, left chest pocket, dual front pockets, button cuffs, side vents, and flat front zip-fly trouser. The Canali brand is known for its wearable, tailor-made suits and dress shirts, making this 2pc suit a must-have for the modern man. With a two-button front and unfinished hem for easy tailoring, this suit offers both style and comfort. Whether you're attending a formal event or heading to the office, this Canali Wool 2pc Suit is sure to make a lasting impression. products.name: Italian Gabardine Side Tab Trouser in Stone
products.brandedName: Todd Snyder Italian Gabardine Side Tab Trouser in Stone
products.unbrandedName: Italian Gabardine Side Tab Trouser in Stone
products.description: Everyone's closet needs the perfect pair of trousers. These certainly fit the bill, crafted from an Italian gabardine, a type of twill worsted wool first introduced in the late 19th century. Lightweight, breathable and durable, our take is a transitional weight 4-ply wool with perfect drape. The silhouette has just enough on-trend fullness, falling straight through the leg, while a single pleat and crease keep things looking clean. Side adjusters and a split back at the waist complete the tailored detailing. Comfortable and chic, these versatile pants have become one of our newest go-to's. Did we mention there's a matching jacket, too? products.name: Arc'teryx Delta 1/2 Zip (Black) Men's Coat
products.description: ; Get ready for your next outdoor adventure wearing the Arc'teryx Delta 1/2 Zip jacket. This innovative fleece insulation not only provides breathable warmth but also boasts a soft, next-to-skin feel for maximum comfort. The unique hollow-core fiber construction delivers an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio, keeping you warm without the bulk. The fleece's construction creates a smooth face for improved durability, while the mock neckline and long sleeves offer added coverage against the elements. Fitted, with articulated patterning for mobility, comfort, and easy layering. Pullover style with a half-zip placket on the front. Phasic AR II engineered polyester fabric is soft, offers stretch and thermal comfort, and is made with wicking fibers. Elasticized binding secures hood. Elasticized binding on the sleeve cuffs and hem. Chin guard for added comfort. Phasic AR II panels under the arms. Laminated zippered chest pocket secures small essentials. Flatlock seam construction improves next-to-skin comfort. Deep front zipper for easy on and off, and rapid ventilation. Brand logo on the left chest. Straight hem. 100% polyester. Machine wash, tumble dry gentle low. Imported.
